workflow.name: Automated plagiarism detection with email reports using RapidAPI & Google Sheets
workflow.description:
## üöÄ **Automated Plagiarism Checker Using Rapid  API & Google Sheet logging**

## üìÑ **Description**

This powerful no-code workflow automates plagiarism detection using [Plagiarism Checker AI Powered](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/plagiarism-checker-ai-powered). Users submit text through Google Sheets. The system checks for duplication using the API, sends a detailed HTML report via email, and logs the results ‚Äî all without human intervention.

---

## üîß **How the Workflow Works**

| **Node Name**                          | **Purpose**                                                                                                                                               |
| -------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `Trigger - New Row in Google Sheet`    | Watches for new rows added to a connected Google Sheet.                                                                                                   |
| `Send Content to Plagiarism API`       | Sends the user-submitted content to the [Plagiarism Checker AI Powered API](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/plagiarism-checker-ai-powered) via POST. |
| `Check API Response Success`           | Verifies if the API responded successfully and returned results.                                                                                          |
| `Extract Plagiarism Results`           | Extracts matched results (if any) from the API response.                                                                                                  |
| `Generate HTML Plagiarism Report`      | Creates a styled HTML report with similarity scores, links, and matched content.                                                                          |
| `Send Report to User via Email`        | Sends the plagiarism report to the user using SMTP.                                                                                                       |
| `Mark Status: Success in Google Sheet` | Updates the Google Sheet with a "Success" status once the email is sent.                                                                                  |
| `Send Failure Alert to IT`             | If the API check fails, sends an alert email to IT for investigation.                                                                                     |
| `Mark Status: Failed in Google Sheet`  | Updates the Google Sheet with a "Failed" status if the process doesn‚Äôt complete successfully.                                                             |

---

## üßæ **Google Sheet Configuration**

### ‚úÖ Required Columns:

| Column Name | Description                            |
| ----------- | -------------------------------------- |
| `Content`   | The text to be checked for plagiarism  |
| `Status`    | Workflow result (`Success` / `Failed`) |

 Make sure these column headers exist in **Row 1** of your Google Sheet.

---

## üìä **How to Connect Google Sheets to n8n**

1. Create a new Google Sheet.
2. In n8n, use the **Google Sheets Trigger** node:

   * Set your document ID (from the sheet‚Äôs URL).
   * Specify the sheet name (e.g., `Sheet1` or use `gid=0`).
3. Use **Google Sheets (service account)** credential type for writing updates.

---

## üîë **How to Get a RapidAPI Key for [Plagiarism Checker AI Powered](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/plagiarism-checker-ai-powered)**

1. Go to [Plagiarism Checker AI Powered API](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/plagiarism-checker-ai-powered).
2. Sign up or log in to RapidAPI.
3. Subscribe to the free or paid plan.
4. Copy your `x-rapidapi-key` and paste it into the `Send Content to Plagiarism API` node's header.

---

## üß† **Use Cases**

* Educators verifying student submissions
* Content marketers validating blog originality
* Academic institutions enforcing anti-plagiarism policies
* Editors reviewing freelance work

---

## ‚úÖ **Benefits**

* ‚öôÔ∏è **100% Automated**: Set once, run forever
* üì® **Instant Reports**: Plagiarism reports delivered via email
* üìã **Easy Tracking**: Status updates in Google Sheet
* üõ°Ô∏è **Alerts Built-in**: Automatic error notification to IT
* üîó Uses [Plagiarism Checker AI Powered API](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/plagiarism-checker-ai-powered) to ensure accuracy and scalability

---

## üìò **Bonus Tips**

* Ensure you handle Google API scopes properly (Editor or Owner access).
* Always test with small content first before scaling up.
* [Plagiarism Checker AI Powered API](https://rapidapi.com/skdeveloper/api/plagiarism-checker-ai-powered) supports **sentence-level matching** and **source URLs**.

nodes.name: Mark Status: Failed in Google Sheet

parameters.content:
Watches for a new row added to a specific Google Sheet.
Triggers the workflow when new content is submitted for plagiarism checking.

Sends the submitted content to the external plagiarism-checking API.
Uses a POST request with necessary headers and the content in the body.

Checks if the API returned a successful response and valid results.
Routes the flow either to process results or handle the failure.

Extracts the results array from the API response.
Prepares raw data for formatting in the next step.

Formats the extracted plagiarism data into a readable HTML report.
Builds a styled email-friendly structure with links, scores, and matched sentences.

Sends the generated plagiarism report to the user via email.
Uses SMTP credentials to deliver the HTML content.

Updates the status column of the original row as "Success".
Confirms that the content was checked and report sent.

Sends an alert email to IT when the API check fails.
Includes content and troubleshooting suggestions in the email.

Marks the row in the Google Sheet with "Failed" status.
Helps track unsuccessful API checks for follow-up.

# üöÄ Automated Plagiarism Checker Workflow in n8n

## ‚úÖ **Short Summary**

An automated plagiarism detection workflow using n8n, Google Sheets, and a third-party API. It checks submitted text for plagiarism, sends a formatted report via email, and logs results in real-time.

---

## üíº **Use Case**

* Ideal for educators, content teams, academic institutions, or editors who need to verify originality of text submitted via a Google Sheet form.


## üéØ **Key Benefits**

* üîÅ **Fully Automated**: No manual checking ‚Äî it triggers on new Google Sheet entries.
* üì© **Instant Reports**: Sends clean, detailed HTML reports directly to the user's inbox.
* üìä **Status Tracking**: Logs success or failure directly in your Google Sheet.
* üö® **IT Alerts**: Notifies your IT team if API or checks fail.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
